front.title: The Management Policy of the Resource Priority Header (RPH) Registry Changed to "IETF Review"

abstract.t: RFC 4412 defines the "Resource-Priority Namespaces" and "Resource-Priority Priority-values" registries. The management policy of these registries is "Standards Action". This document normatively updates RFC 4412 to change the management policy of these registries to "IETF Review".
